description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. First-Person Mathematics is a mathematical adventure where the player must navigate rooms without standing on any tiles marked with incorrect sums. Fail and you plummet to certain doom, but if you succeed you can take your rightful place amongst the great mathematicians of history.
